StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_VerifyEduca.onAtContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @ContractID int, @ContractBeginDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @MarineCandidateID int DECLARE @Educa.onCode char(1) DECLARE @Educa.onLevel varchar(2)
SELECT @MarineCandidateID = MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION CE WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE, @ContractBeginDate) >= 0) BEGIN --- VERIFY ANY EDUCATION RECORDS THAT WERE COMPLETED ON OR BEFORE THE CONTRACT BEGIN DATE UPDATE CANDIDATE_EDUCATION SET VERIFICATION = 'VERIFIED', USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, SCHOOL_END_DATE, @ContractBeginDate) >= 0
--- GET THE APPLICANTS EDUCATION LEVEL AND CODE AT CONTRACT SELECT @Educa.onCode = CE.EDUCATION_CODE, @Educa.onLevel = CE.EDUCATION_LEVEL FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION CE WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID AND CE.SCHOOL_END_DATE = (SELECT MAX(E.SCHOOL_END_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_EDUCATION E WHERE E.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, E.SCHOOL_END_DATE, @ContractBeginDate) >= 0)
--- UPDATE THE APPLICANT'S EDUCATION LEVEL AND CODE IN THE NWA TABLE UPDATE NWA SET EDUCATION_CODE = @Educa.onCode, EDUCATION_LEVEL = @Educa.onLevel, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END
